Row.Text: Modern Era infantry unit that has a higher [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength than the Infantry it replaces. This Unit earns points toward a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age when it defeats an enemy, has a combat bonus outside of friendly territory, and defends better against all Ranged Attacks. May only be built by Brazil.

This Unit earns points toward a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age when it defeats an enemy, has a combat bonus outside of friendly territory, and defends better against all Ranged Attacks. May only be built by Brazil.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]Modern Era infantry unit that has a higher [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength than the Infantry it replaces. This Unit earns points toward a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age when it defeats an enemy, has a combat bonus outside of friendly territory, and defends better against all Ranged Attacks. May only be built by Brazil.

This melee unit earns points toward starting the next Carnival for Brazil when it defeats an enemy. It also has a higher [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength than the Infantry it replaces, receives a combat bonus outside friendly territory, and has extra defence against all Ranged Attacks. Use them to fight wars in foreign lands to push Brazil toward the next Carnival.

Use them to fight wars in foreign lands to push Brazil toward the next Carnival.
